mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, NVL(A.USER_PWD, '') USER_PWD, NVL(A.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.USER_GENDER, '') USER_GENDER, NVL(A.USER_STATUS, 'N') USER_STATUS, NVL(A.USER_REGION, '') USER_REGION, NVL(A.USER_FOOD, '') USER_FOOD, NVL(A.USER_TEL, '') USER_TEL, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.USER_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') USER_REG_DATE, NVL(A.USER_IMAGE_NAME, '') USER_IMAGE_NAME, NVL(A.USER_IMAGE_ORG_NAME, '') USER_IMAGE_ORG_NAME, NVL(A.USER_IMAGE_EXT, '') USER_IMAGE_EXT, NVL(A.USER_IMAGE_SIZE, 0) USER_IMAGE_SIZE, NVL(B.BBS_CNT, 0) USER_BBS_CNT, NVL(C.COM_CNT, 0) USER_COM_CNT FROM USER_TABLE A, (SELECT USER_ID, COUNT(BBS_SEQ) BBS_CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM BBS WHERE BBS_STATUS = 'Y') GROUP BY USER_ID) B, (SELECT USER_ID, COUNT(COM_SEQ) COM_CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM COM WHERE COM_STATUS = 'Y') GROUP BY USER_ID) C WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID(+) AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, USER_STATUS, USER_REGION, USER_FOOD, USER_TEL, USER_REG_DATE, USER_IMAGE_NAME, USER_IMAGE_ORG_NAME, USER_IMAGE_EXT, USER_IMAGE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, 'Y', #{userRegion}, #{userFood}, #{userTel}, SYSDATE, #{userImageName}, #{userImageOrgName}, #{userImageExt}, #{userImageSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_GENDER = #{userGender}, USER_REGION = #{userRegion}, USER_FOOD = #{userFood}, USER_TEL = #{userTel}, USER_IMAGE_NAME = #{userImageName}, USER_IMAGE_ORG_NAME = #{userImageOrgName}, USER_IMAGE_EXT = #{userImageExt}, USER_IMAGE_SIZE = #{userImageSize} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USER_TEL = #{userTel} AND USER_NAME = #{userName} AND USER_STATUS = 'Y'
